# Standard Operating Procedure
These are sets of regulations and polices used by GOVFOR/OPFOR and all relevant military factions. \nFailure to follow the Standard Operating Procedure may result in [bold]Failure to Follow Procedure[/bold] charges under the UCMJ.
## Categories - [textlink="Command" link="AI14SOPCommand"] - [textlink="Rank Structure" link="AU14SOPRankStructure"] - [textlink="Rules of Engagement" link="AI14SOPRulesofEngagement"] - [textlink="Equipment and Personnel" link="AI14SOPEquipmentAndPersonnel"] - [textlink="Dropships and Aircraft" link="AI14SOPDropshipsandAircraft"] - [textlink="Third-Party Regulations" link="AU14SOPThirdParty"]
